Text: Re Update on Revenue ManagementBusiness Analysis Project Study CostsI checked the additional on this Work Order The charges are for Consulting Services for Sheryl E Kimes Cornell University The invoice was addressed to you on April and approved by Martha Janousek Where do you want the charges to be reclassed to Kimberly Watson PM To Virginia LongET NRON cc Martha JanousekET NRON Subject Update on Revenue ManagementBusiness Analysis Project Study Costs Here it is Thanks Kim and Martha Forwarded by Kimberly WatsonETSEnron on PM Elaine Concklin AM To Kimberly WatsonET NRON Steve GilbertET NRON James CentilliET NRON Kent MillerET NRON Sophie PatelET NRON Gary ZahnET NRON Martha JanousekET NRON cc Bob ChandlerET NRON Rod NRON Subject Update on Revenue ManagementBusiness Analysis Project Study Costs There are costs of MM left in the old PROS Jwork order These costs can be capitalized but were not included in the project economics Per discussions with Rod we will set up a separate Swork order to move these costs into close out the Jwo and add a separate line item in the nd Capital Current Estimate At year end we will add these costs to the project They will not affect the project economics and there is no cash impact as they were spent in No additional approvals will be required for this amount but these costs will come out of the discretionary pool of capital dollars because they were never charged against capital spending when paid Forwarded by Elaine ConcklinETSEnron on AM George Fastuca PM To Bill CordesET nron cc Frank BayET nron Steve GilbertET nron Bob ChandlerET nron Elaine ConcklinET nron Subject Applicability of SOP to Revenue Management Study Costs To summarize Bobs note on the business analysis work order of the MM costs thru July MM can be capitalized assuming the project goes forward The other MM and future preliminary pre coding costs need to be expensed The recent SOP effective has tightened up the capital expense rulings on systems projects By the way this also significantly impacts the costs classifications of the Corp SAP project Forwarded by George FastucaETSEnron on PM Bob Chandler PM To George FastucaET nron cc Subject Applicability of SOP to Revenue Management Study Costs Heres the accounting memorandum I prepared on the referenced subject
Work Order Completion Form Forwarded by Virginia LongETSEnron on AM Rene Bickerstaff AM To Virginia LongET NRON cc Subject Work Order Completion Form

Re Work Order JNThanks for this portion of information I still need Your FAR Number for the transfer of out of the work order Kimberly Watson AM To Virginia LongET NRON cc Martha JanousekET NRON Subject Work Order JN Virginia In effort to complete the closeout the original work order for Revenue Management JN please take the additional late charge of from third party contractSheryl Kimes and move it from the JN Work Order and charge it to Work Order c RM Science As we discussed this transfer needs to be effective for December business If you need anything else regarding this charge please dont hesitate to call me Thanks Kim X
